title: Drag & Drop
content: Both Matrix View and Scrum Board View allows Drag & Drop to move the tasks from one area to another.

title: Sync to OneDrive
content: Sync data to your OneDrive by simply click a button. You can sync between the Windows 8 client and Windows Phone 8.1 client too.

title: Send to Calendar
content: Arrange doesn't provide notification but you can send any task to your Live Calendar, where a notification will be created.

title: Fast Add
content: You won't always have time or it won't be always necessary to type in a lot of details. Click a button on the target area, put in the title and save. New task created.

title: Custom Category
content: Manage categories in Settings to better arrange the tasks.

title: Checklist
content: It is important to double-check when a task item is done. Put a checklist a head and use that when you mark a task done.

title: Import / Export / Sync Data
content: Data is important. Export them frequently and get them back when you needed. Sync is a convenient way to export the data directly to the most recent used location.
